page.title: 13Trade in Long Marton
page.content: The village shop is the post office and a general store.It is owned by Mrs.Vera Wardle and she has been there for fourteen years. It is very hard to keep village sh- ops open and many are closing down.Mrs Wardle isn't sure how much longer she will be able to keep the shop open. The problem really is the big sup- ermarkets in places like Penrith,App- leby and Carlisle.These big stores can by things more cheaply and keep their prices low.Mrs.Wardle cannot by in bulk and so cannot keep her prises low.People in the village with cars can go to the big supermarkets and on- ly buy things that they forget from her shop. The butchers which opens for just a few hours each day in a converted barn and the village shop are the only ones in our block.
